name: ThirdSpace
description: Full-stack web app for discovering and reviewing productive public spaces, featuing search, filtering, and interactive maps using the Mapbox API. Built with React and a fastAPI backend to support user-submitted data and images.

name: Yet Another Chat App
description: Real-time chat app built with TypeScript, Express, MongoDB, and WebSockets, featuring JWT authentication with bcrypt password hashing and REST APIs for user/session management. Deployed using GitHub Actions and Render for continuous delivery.

name: Accessible Web Interface for Robot Control
description: React interface integrated with ROS (Robot Operating System) to enable real-time teleoperation and feedback from a robotic arm. Built to support accessbility in a human-robot interaction study, allowing participants to control physical hardware through a browser-based system.

name: No More Vibecoding!
description: Built a Chrome extension that blocks copying from popular LLM interfaces to encourage active problem-solving and reduce over-reliance on generated code during learning.
